verse: This word from the Eternal came to Jeremiah when Jehoiakim (son of Josiah) was king of Judah.
So I took the leader of this clan, Jaazaniah (son of Jeremiah and grandson of Habazziniah) along with his brothers and sons who represented all of the Rechabites

to the temple of the Eternal. I led them into a side room that was used by the sons of Hanan (son of Igdaliah), a man of God. This room was right next to the room used by temple officials and right over the room of Maaseiah (son of Shallum), the doorkeeper.
Once we were in the room, I set before these Rechabite men pitchers full of wine with some cups.
After this encounter with the Rechabites, the word of the Eternal came to instruct Jeremiah.
